John Engler and the Legislature over the Michigan Education Association on the issue of funding retired teachers ' health care. /7A COMMUNITY LIFE Double good: They come by twos, sometimes three, even fours and fives. For mothers who face the challenge of nurturing t^uis, triplets or more, there's the Mothers of Multiples Club to help smooth the way. /11A ®anton®bscruer SPORTS Champa and the bubble: Plymouth Canton's win over Farmington combined with Livonia Churchill's upset of Westland John Glenn means the Chiefs clinched at least a tie for the WLAA championship.
